####**Data Sources and Methodology**

* Data obtained from PLS and filtered to show relevant transactions and current deals on the market.
* Select active deals or previous M&A activity in the map.
* Table includes current deals.

####**Select Highlights**

* Recent transactions in the Delaware have clustered near the platform on the Eastern side.
* In the Northern Delaware, Linn Energy and Caza Petroleum have acreage for sale.
    + Caza's acreage is scattered throughout the Eastern side, while Linn has a large block located on the Shelf.
* BHP marketing Southern Delaware acreage primarily located in Reeves County. Well results have been below the industry average.
    + Majority of wells completed with Cross Link.
* Fire sale in Culberson County; Three Rivers, Tall City, US Energy and Vermilion (Glasscock County as well) each have their acreage on the market.
    + Poor well results from multiple operators have discouraged potential buyers.
* Oxy has listed multiple packages for sale in the Midland Basin.
    + In Northwest Reagan County, 5,130 net acres is listed for sale. They recently spud 8 wells nearby on the Hawker lease with results pending.
    + Oxy is also selling 4,967 net acres located in Andrews County, directly offsetting Concho acreage.

```{r}
library(geojsonio)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(spatialEco)
library( htmltools )
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
shp <- geojson_read("Geojson.json",
  what = "sp")

lilis <- readOGR(".","Lil_One_01_31_18_MA_Shapefile_63589",verbose =F)

lilis@data$NetAcre<-"2,798"

deals_in_play<- readOGR(".","listingGeometryViewDEVPolygon",verbose = F)


bhp<- readOGR(".","BHP",verbose = F)
cxo_leases<- readOGR(".","cxo_leases_2018-01-22",verbose = F)

net_acres<- openxlsx::read.xlsx("Net_Acres.xlsx",sheet=1)
net_acres<- net_acres%>%select(id,Net.Acres)
```




```{r}
shp<- sp.na.omit(shp, col.name = 'X__Acre')


shp<- shp[!grepl("Franco-Nevada Corp|Viper Energy Partners LP|WildHorse Resource Development Corp",shp$buyers),]
shp<- shp[grepl("Unconventional",shp$US_play),]


shp@data$X__Acre<- as.numeric(as.character(shp@data$X__Acre))
shp@data$value___MM_<- as.numeric(as.character(shp@data$value___MM_))

shp<- shp[shp$X__Acre > 1000,]

shp$Net_Acres<- shp$value___MM_*1000000/shp$X__Acre

#tbl<- shp@data
#tbl<- tbl%>% select(buyers, sellers, id,headline)%>%distinct()
#write.csv(tbl,"tbl2.csv")
net_acres$id<- as.character(net_acres$id)
shp@data$id<- as.character(shp@data$id)

shp@data<- left_join(shp@data,net_acres)

shp$Net.Acres<- paste(prettyNum(shp$Net.Acres,big.mark = ","),sep="")
shp$PricePerAcre<- paste("$",prettyNum(shp$X__Acre,big.mark = ","),sep="")

lilis$DOLACRE<- paste("$",prettyNum(lilis$DOLACRE,big.mark = ","),sep="")
```



```{r}
deals_in_play<- deals_in_play[!grepl("Minerals|Royalty|Prospects",deals_in_play$DealType),]

labs_deals <- lapply(seq(nrow(deals_in_play@data)), function(i) {
  paste0("Seller: ", deals_in_play@data[i, "Seller"], '<p>',
         "Producing Wells/Net Acreage: ", deals_in_play@data[i,"WellsAcrea"], 
         "Deal Type: ",deals_in_play@data[i,'DealType'],'<p>',
         "Listing Date: ", deals_in_play@data[i,'listing_Da']) 
})


bhp$Net_Acres<- paste(prettyNum(bhp$Net_Acres,big.mark = ","),sep="")
bhp$Production<- paste(prettyNum(bhp$Production,big.mark = ","),sep="")



labs_bhp<- lapply(seq(nrow(bhp@data)), function(i) {
  paste0("Seller: ",bhp@data[i, "Company"], '<p>',
         "Producing Wells/Net Acreage: ", bhp@data[i,"Net_Acres"],'<p>',
         "Current Production: ",bhp@data[i,'Production']) 
})


labs_lilis <- lapply(seq(nrow(lilis@data)), function(i) {
  paste0("Buyer: ", lilis@data[i, "BUYERS"], '<p>',
         "Net Acres: ", lilis@data[i, "NetAcre"],'<p>',
         "$/Acre: ",lilis@data[i, "DOLACRE"],'<p>',
         "Seller: ",lilis@data[i, "SELLERS"],'<p>',
         "Transaction Date: ", lilis@data[i,'ANNDATE']) 
})


```



```{r}
pal <- colorFactor(c("yellow","blue","green","orange","purple","black","#ace600","#00ffff","#666633"), shp$id)

deal_pal <- colorFactor(c("#ffe6ea","#ff99aa","#ff1a40","#e60073"),deals_in_play$id)


labs <- lapply(seq(nrow(shp@data)), function(i) {
  paste0("Buyer: ", shp@data[i, "buyers"], '<p>',
         "Net Acres: ", shp@data[i, "Net.Acres"],'<p>',
         "$/Acre: ",shp@data[i, "PricePerAcre"],'<p>',
         "Seller: ",shp@data[i, "sellers"],'<p>',
         "Transaction Date: ", shp@data[i,'date_announced']) 
})



leaflet() %>%addTiles(group = "Esri.WorldTopoMap")%>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldTopoMap)%>%
  addPolygons(data=cxo_leases,stroke=F, fillColor = "grey",fillOpacity = .5,color=NA)%>%
  addPolygons(data=shp, weight = 1, color = "#000000",
              fillColor=~pal(id),
              fillOpacity=0.7,label=lapply(labs,HTML),
              highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
                color='red', opacity = 1, weight = 1.5, fillOpacity = 1,
                bringToFront = TRUE, sendToBack = TRUE),
              group="Transacted Deals") %>%
  addPolygons(data=lilis, weight = 1, color = "#000000",
              fillColor="#0033cc",
              fillOpacity=0.7,label=lapply(labs_lilis,HTML),
              highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
                color='red', opacity = 1, weight = 1.5, fillOpacity = 1,
                bringToFront = TRUE, sendToBack = TRUE),
              group="Transacted Deals")%>% 
  addPolygons(data=deals_in_play, weight = 1, color = "#000000",
              fillColor=~deal_pal(id),
              fillOpacity=0.7,label=lapply(labs_deals,HTML),
              highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
                color='#00ff00', opacity = 1, weight = 1.5, fillOpacity = 1,
                bringToFront = TRUE, sendToBack = TRUE),
              group="Deals In Play") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups=c("Transacted Deals","Deals In Play"),
    position = "topleft",
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )%>%
  addPolygons(data=bhp, weight = 1, color = "#000000",
              fillColor="red",
              fillOpacity=0.7,label=lapply(labs_bhp,HTML),
              highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
                color='#00ff00', opacity = 1, weight = 1, fillOpacity = 1,
                bringToFront = TRUE, sendToBack = TRUE),
              group="Deals In Play") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups=c("Transacted Deals","Deals In Play"),
    position = "topleft",
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )%>%
  addFullscreenControl( pseudoFullscreen = T)%>%suspendScroll()%>% addScaleBar(position="topleft")

```
